M

main - package main
 
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.WindowManager
 
mainWindow - Variable in class main.BattleWindow
A MainWindow which is used to contain the MainWindow object that created this instance of BattleWindow, used to exit this window and go back to the MainWindow object window
mainWindow - Variable in class main.MonJoinsWindow
A GameWindow variable, which holds the window that created this window, used so that we may go back to that window
mainWindow - Variable in class main.ShopMenu
A MainWindow variable which contains the window that created this window/ShopMenu object
mainWindow - Variable in class main.WindowManager
An MainWindow variable, used to "open" a new instance of EnvironmentWindow
MainWindow - Class in main
An class which uses Java Swing to create a window, used in conjunction with instances of classes Battle, Shop, Player and "Window" classes such as BattleWindow, MenuWindow and ShopWindow, to provide the main game play loop of the game
MainWindow(Player, int, boolean) - Constructor for class main.MainWindow
The public constructor for this class, takes a Player parameter player, an int parameter gameLength, and a boolean parameter hard, as its parameters
manager - Variable in class main.GameWindow
An WindowManager variable, used to hold the instance of WindowManager that created this instance of GameWindow
maxHealth - Variable in class main.Monster
A int variable contains the maximum amount of health this monster can have
MaxHealthPotion - Class in main
A subclass of Items this is the Max Health Potion that will increase the Monsters max health by 50 and decrease the gold by 50 when bought and increase gold by 25 when sold
MaxHealthPotion() - Constructor for class main.MaxHealthPotion
constructor for the max health potion from the items super class
menuWindow - Variable in class main.MainWindow
 
MenuWindow - Class in main
An class which uses Java Swing to create a window, used in conjunction with an instance of Player, that the user may manage their monsters and items
MenuWindow(Player, GameWindow) - Constructor for class main.MenuWindow
A public constructor, takes an Player parameter player, and a GameWindow parameter window as its a parameters
mon_menu - Variable in class main.MainWindow
A JButton which when pressed will take the user to a window where they can manage their items/monsters
monJoins - Class in main
A subclass of RandomEvent, an instance of this class is a "Random Event
monJoins() - Constructor for class main.monJoins
 
MonJoinsWindow - Class in main
The class that implements the GUI needed to run the monJoins random event
MonJoinsWindow(Player, Monster, GameWindow) - Constructor for class main.MonJoinsWindow
A public constructor that takes a Player parameter player, a Monster parameter monster, and a GameWindow parameter window
monLeaves - Class in main
A subclass of RandomEvent, an instance of this class is a "Random Event
monLeaves() - Constructor for class main.monLeaves
 
monMenu - Variable in class main.BattleWindow
A JButton which when pressed will take the user to a window where they can manage their items/monsters
monRandLvlUp - Class in main
A subclass of RandomEvent, an instance of this class is a "Random Event
monRandLvlUp() - Constructor for class main.monRandLvlUp
 
monster - Variable in class main.MonJoinsWindow
A Monster variable, which holds the instance of Monster that will be added to the users list of monsters
Monster - Class in main
An instance of this class is a monster, but in this game only intances of this classes sub classes are ever made
Monster(String) - Constructor for class main.Monster
A constructor that takes a String variable name as its parameter, used so that the name of the monster may be set when an Monster object is created
monsters - Variable in class main.Shop
an array of monsters that will be sold in the shop
